description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sayan Datta Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load: from n/a through 1.4.8.

product.name: Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load
Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load
